PPMonth.title: Reason's Greetings
PPMonth.notes: This month's puzzles were created by Puzzled Pint organizers from Portland, Chicago, and the Bay Area.

puzzle.title: Gift Exchange
puzzle.hint: Each answer word on the left side is similar to an answer word on the right.
An example word pair is auditory organs EARS and eons ERAS.
The AR and RA in EARS/ERAS fit in the windowpane-shaped blanks. You can use this to figure out which word pair goes in which spot.

The remaining word pairs are :
- FARMER/FRAMER - DEIFY/EDIFY - SIGN/SING - SPILT/SPLIT - VEER/EVER - BOAST/BOATS - PLAIN/PALIN - ARCING/RACING
